body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Larry Gonzales and the customer's name is Brenda Martinez.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I represent Bright Solutions, your trusted tech support company.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Sarah. Nice to meet you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you too! May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could I also get your phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's four zero two, six five four, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble with my laptop. It won't start up.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can certainly help you with that. Thank you for your time today, John! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
